title: Enhanced update.json with index-level operations
description: Extend update.json to support index-level changes (moveToPending, moveToBlocked, removeStories) so agents can safely modify PRD state without direct index.json edits. Ralph auto-merges on startup.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Support moveToPending: ['BUG-017'] - moves from blocked to pending
Support moveToBlocked: ['US-001', 'reason'] - moves to blocked with blockedBy
Support removeStories: ['US-094'] - removes from all arrays and deletes file
Existing updateStories and newStories still work
Add tests for each new operation
Test: moveToPending removes from blocked, adds to pending, clears blockedBy
Test: moveToBlocked removes from pending, adds to blocked, sets blockedBy
Test: removeStories deletes from all arrays and removes story file
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: feat: US-111 enhanced update.json with index operations
